blankmod:UncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
blankmod:UncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

blankmod:RareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
blankmod:RareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
blankmod:RareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

blankmod:RarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
blankmod:RarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

blankmod:AttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
blankmod:AttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !blankmod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

blankmod:SecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
blankmod:SecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !blankmod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
